sentences.sentence: It seems that all the time she spends sunbathing has made her a nymphomaniac, and he is unable to keep her satisfied.
sentences.translation: 这一切似乎她花日光浴的时间已经让她一个慕男狂，他是无法让她满意。

sentences.sentence: Thomas Vinterberg (the Hunt, Far From the Madding Crowd) co-founded the Dogme 95 film collective with Nymphomaniac director Lars von Trier, a movement he has compared to a commune.
sentences.translation: 托马斯·温特·伯格(电影《狩猎》和《远离尘嚣》的导演)和《女性瘾者》的导演拉尔斯•冯•特里尔联合发起一场名叫道格玛95的电影运动，他将这场电影运动比作一个公社。
